verbose_text: The enzyme activity assays we performed showed that minocycline (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY C; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) inhibited PARP2 at much lower concentrations than those that provide effective PARP1 inhibition, suggesting that minocycline is acting as a selective PARP2 inhibitor.
evidence: minocycline ( XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY C;  XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ) inhibited PARP2
